author: jdillon
msg: Adding RemoteShell interface, renamed RemoteShell class to DefaultRemoteShell
Changed SessionInputStream.write() to take a WriteStreamMessage
Dropped the stream name muck for now (maybe bring it back after its all working)

author: sebor
msg: to avoid code bloat due to compiler emitting their definition
in every object file where the class is used.

author: jaz
msg: changed so the purgeOldJobs service can only run one at a time to prevent locking on the job sandbox table; when it is running on multiple application servers at the same time

author: jmsnell
msg: Remove the bouncy castle dependencies.  It will still be downloaded and used during the build
for testing, but it is no longer distributed with the zip.
